name: TOOTS (according to God)
description:
BEWARE: SACRILEGE, SATIRE, and SARCASM DIRECTED AT RELIGION AHEAD

Arrow Keys to move, Z to accept/move forward the text, X to open/close the menu/go back in menus.

"TOOTS, (The Origin Of The Species) according to God."

One day, Adam and Eve done messed up and made God real mad. Then God banished them to Earth, leaving them with a very important task. Adam just wants to do the right thing, but he has to find Eve first...

There are bugs. Just don't have time before the end of the jam to finish it up, so just a buggy demo for now.
